feed.title: FU Zhengnan
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Participated in DAC 2025 as third author

link.title: Participated in DAC 2025 as third author

entry.content: Our paper on High Energy-efficiency and Low latency In-Memory Computing using Analog Accumulator and In-Memory ADC with shared References was presented at DAC 2025.
entry.summary: Our paper on High Energy-efficiency and Low latency In-Memory Computing using Analog Accumulator and In-Memory ADC with shared References was presented at DAC 2025.
